channel.title: Me needs a project
channel.description: Could anyone give me a project to work on that'll occupy me for a while, possibly in BCEL?

item.title: Me needs a project
item.dc:creator: @di.doops di.doops
item.description:
@di.doops wrote:

i have a project for somone to do

-You have been hired by an educational company to create computer program in Java for specific subject areas.
The company has offered its employees a bonus incentive for original program development menus.
The company requires you to create a page menu containing at least three different subject menu items.
Each item must represent different subject area content.
Examples:
Math – money investment calculations

  • using Cosine law calculating the angle of a triangle
    Physics – calculating velocity and acceleration
  • calculating potential difference
  • using Ohm’s law
    Biology - health assessment based on the number of white blood cell count.
    Arts – evaluating the popularity of an exhibit based on the number of visitors coming to a gallery.

The program is expected to be interactive where the user enters chosen values to be used.

please and thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Me needs a project
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“Krichevskoy, post:5, topic:39528”]Most obviously: write a RuneScape bot.
But here are some more interesting ideas:

[ul][li]Reverse an obfuscation or write an obfuscator.[/li]
[li]Make up a basic language and write a Java compiler for it.[/li]
[li]Create a transformation framework.[/li]
[li]Create a bytecode editor with a GUI.[/li]
[li]Write a program slicer (or any analysis tool).[/li][/ul]

(note: these are all ideas that you could use BCEL for)[/quote]Hmmm… I think I’ll go with your 3rd idea.

Read full topic
